poem:
Title: The Morning Paper's Witness

Morning sun glistens on cream paper,
Lays bare the whispers of distant thunder,
In a language of pebbled words and silent cries.
Lawyers weigh the measure of human sighs,
Besmirched with the ink of uncertain morality.
Little can they conclude from chambers afar,
Only "serious concerns" uttered, echoing off walls of power,
While a skyline quietly arranges itself in scars.
